{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the documents, the most mucostatic impression material is the one that records the soft tissues in their resting state without applying pressure. The documents mention that mucostatic impressions are taken with low viscosity materials such as impression paste, alginate, or light body silicone. Among the given options, the most suitable choice would be B. Zinc oxide eugenol impression paste, as it is mentioned in Document [13] that zinc-oxide eugenol plaster (impression paste) produces a mucostatic impression.", "answer_choice": "B"}
